Author: meimeiya
Text: same, I like watching mukbangs (although I tend to watch people who try to keep their eating noises to a minimum) but I can't concentrate on anything if someone's smacking their lips next to me. my roommate does this seemingly every time they put anything in their mouth and it was so annoying i had to just move my workspace back to my own room entirely.  it's definitely a control sort of thing imo, because if i'm seeking those videos out i'm choosing to listen to someone eat. but if i'm trying to work or relax and I hear my roommate start eating three feet away while smacking their lips together every second, i have to block it out or leave.
